Html:
For general Windows samples where "UI" is not the demo focus (e.g. how to call WMI to query the domain users), do you prefer that the samples are written in:

a) a simple console project

b) a simple windows forms project

c) a simple WPF project

You may also join the vote on our Facebook page: http://www.facebook.com/groups/onecode/
I prefer WPF project, because I love WPF and I am familiar with it. By the way: I never used windows forms.
